title: update league without restarting computer?
body: How do you update league without restarting your computer? I got a bugsplat as soon as the game got updated which cancelled the update and now it wont update. The same thing happened last patch and I had to restart my computer so is there anyway to update it without restart?

replies.body: no clue, since you're the first person i've ever heard of that has to restart their pc after a league update.

It updates and then as soon as it finishes I get a bugsplat. Which cancels the update and when I try to reopen the client it gives me this message "We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." but nothing happens
